doc.name: Triangular
doc.description: Produce a random sequence with a triangular distribution. On each iteration, a new random number is produced. The output port is of type double. The values that are generated are independent and identically distributed with mode and bounds as defined by the parameters. In addition, the seed can be specified as a parameter to control the sequence that is generated.
doc.author: Raymond A. Cardillo
doc.property: The minimum value. This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 0.0.
The maximum value. This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 1.0.
The mode of the distribution (peak of triangle). This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 0.5.
